home.description: Experienced in developing web applications and REST APIs with React, Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Focused on clean code, API integration, and responsive user-centered design, with strong collaboration in Agile/Scrum environments.

about.title: About Me
about.description: A brief insight into who I am, my journey, and expertise.
about.me: I'm Neng Rahmawati, a student of Informatics Management at Universitas Nasional PASIM. As a PUB Scholarship recipient, I have undergone two years of intensive training that built strong technical skills in Java, React, database management, and REST API. Experienced in team projects, I focus on developing user-friendly applications and efficient API integration. I am a fast learner, collaborative, and passionate about delivering quality technical solutions. I am also a responsible individual who is always ready to keep learning and growing, ensuring that every task I take on is completed with commitment, reliability, and a strong drive to contribute effectively to any team or project.

certificate.title: Certificates
certificate.description: Each certificate is a small step in my bigger journey of learning and growing. This is a collection of achievements I've accumulated over the past 2 years.

project.title: My Projects
project.description: A collection of my projects that demonstrates my experience and expertise in technology.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or just want to say hi.

timeline.title: Diploma in Informatics Management
description: PUB Scholarship recipient, participated in an intensive 2-year program.
Participated in training courses ranging from Logic & Algorithms, to Fundamental and Advanced Programming, each consisting of 16 sessions.
Worked on application development projects approximately every 4 months.
Actively participated in team projects to develop applications and User-friendly API integration.

timeline.title: Natural Sciences
description: Grade point average: 91.45
Ranked 4th out of 160 science students
Completed high school with a focus on natural sciences.
Member of the Science Club and Physics Olympiad team.
Organized a school-level science fair.

timeline.title: Fundamental Front-End Programming Training (React)
description: Learned the basics of React JS for front-end development.
Built interactive web applications using React.

timeline.title: Advanced Back-End Programming Training (Java)
description: Studied advanced back-end concepts such as REST API and MVC.
Built more complex back-end applications using Java.
Integrated back-end with databases.

timeline.title: GitHub Training
description: Learned version control using Git and GitHub.
Practiced team collaboration through GitHub repositories.
Managed branches, merges, and pull requests in team projects.

timeline.title: Fundamental Back-End Programming Training (Java)
description: Learned the basics of Java programming for back-end development.
Studied Object-Oriented Programming concepts including classes, objects, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Integrated database with Java applications.

timeline.title: Web Programming Training (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
description: Learned the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Built simple interactive websites.
Integrated front-end with simple external APIs to dynamically display data.

timeline.title: Database Training
description: Studied relational database concepts and SQL.
Managed databases using MySQL.
Learned JOIN operations, aggregate functions, and basic database operations.

timeline.title: Data Structure Training
description: Learned advanced data structure concepts such as queue, tree, and graph.
Implemented data structures in C programming.
Completed mini projects to solve complex algorithm problems.

timeline.title: Logic & Algorithm Training (C Programming Language)
description: Learned basic programming logic and algorithms using C.
Understood fundamental data structures such as arrays and created CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
Implemented a final project using a console-based CRUD application for hands-on data management practice.

quote: We don't just build applications — we build experiences that empower, inspire, and elevate your vision.

proj-3.title: Trip Mate – Full-Stack Web Application
proj-3.description: A dynamic web application serving as proof of rapid mastery of React fundamentals. Designed as an intensive final project to transform theory into a functional product with comprehensive data management.

details.0: Demonstrated agile learning by translating theoretical concepts from React training into a real-world application, proving the ability to effectively adopt and apply new technologies in a short timeframe.
details.1: Designed and executed a logical data architecture with full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, and implemented dynamic search and sorting features to create a user-centric data management experience.
details.2: Optimized application state and component lifecycle management using React Hooks (useState, useEffect), resulting in a clean, efficient, and modern component architecture.

proj-4.title: Loco Booking Management API – Collaborative Reservation System
proj-4.description: A robust and scalable REST API for a train reservation system, handling the core logic from booking to authentication. This project was the result of an intensive 40-day team collaboration with a focus on reliability and security.

details.0: Actively contributed to the team's project development lifecycle, from system architecture design and task delegation to code integration, ensuring effective collaboration and on-time project delivery.
details.1: Took a key role in security implementation by designing and integrating Spring Security for role-based authentication and authorization, securing API endpoints from unauthorized access and ensuring data integrity.
details.2: Enhanced system functionality by developing critical features like automated email notifications for booking confirmations and scheduled tasks (cron jobs) for background processes, demonstrating an understanding of automation and operational efficiency.

proj-5.title: Loan Management API – End-to-End Financial Solution
proj-5.description: An independently developed REST API designed to handle the entire loan management lifecycle. This project demonstrates the ability to translate complex financial business requirements into a functional and structured API service in just 7 days.

details.0: Showcased high discipline, independent project management, and rapid execution capabilities by autonomously completing the API's development from concept to full implementation within one week.
details.1: Built powerful API endpoints by translating complex financial business logic—including dynamic installment calculations, loan eligibility validation, and payment history tracking—into efficient code.
details.2: Implemented comprehensive CRUD functionality as a solid and structured data foundation for customer, loan, and payment entities, ensuring data integrity and ease of management.

proj-6.title: Bumi Ama – Full-Stack Reservation Solution with Access Control
proj-6.description: An end-to-end reservation solution developed in 15 days, covering both frontend and backend. The application is designed with a security architecture that strictly separates access rights between regular users and administrators.

details.0: Demonstrated full-stack capabilities by managing the entire development lifecycle, from user interface design to server-side logic and database management, in a fast-paced, result-oriented development environment.
details.1: Designed and implemented an effective Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system, where admins have full control over crucial data, to guarantee data security and provide a role-appropriate user experience.

proj-7.title: Celestial Nexus – Astronomical Data Visualization
proj-7.description: A web portal that transforms raw scientific data from NASA into an engaging and educational visual experience. This project highlights skills in third-party API integration and the intuitive presentation of complex data.

details.0: Proactively studied technical documentation and orchestrated the integration with NASA's external API, showcasing rapid adaptation to new technologies and the ability to work with external data sources.
details.1: Designed an interface that not only displays data but also tells a story, focusing on User Experience (UX) to ensure that complex astronomical information can be enjoyed and understood by a general audience.

proj-8.title: Aroma POS – CLI-Based Cashier System in C
proj-8.description: An efficient and lightweight Point-of-Sale application built from the ground up in C. This project demonstrates a fundamental understanding of computer science, memory management, and high-performance application development without framework dependencies.

details.0: Demonstrated expertise in C by designing custom data structures (`structs`) and managing persistent data through file I/O operations, ensuring that transaction and inventory data is stored securely and can be retrieved.
details.1: Built an efficient solution with a structured command-line interface, focusing on performance, minimal resource consumption, and a clear user interaction flow through careful input validation.
